post.summary: Create an organization.  The organization owner automatically gets the Administrator role and has allow_login set to true.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: The time zone for the organization, must be one of: http://php.net/manual/en/timezones.php

parameters.name: login_url
parameters.description: The login url of the client site.  Users will be redirected here after being logged out of Best Atendance. If not provided, will redirect to bestattendance.com

parameters.name: image_url
parameters.description: The logo to display in the header.  Must be 120px x 50px.  If not provided, the Best Attendance logo will be used.

parameters.name: header_color
parameters.description: The background color of the Best Attendance header (do not include the leading #).  If not provided, default blue gradient will be used.

parameters.name: secondary_color
parameters.description: The bottom border color of the Best Attendance header (do not include the leading #).  If not provided, default orange color will be used.

parameters.name: menu_text_color
parameters.description: The text color for the main menu.

parameters.name: first_name
parameters.description: First name of the account owner

parameters.name: last_name
parameters.description: Last name of the account owner

parameters.name: email_address
parameters.description: Email address of the account owner

parameters.name: phone
parameters.description: 10 digit phone number of the account owner; numerals only

parameters.name: address1
parameters.description: Address line 1 of the account owner

parameters.name: address2
parameters.description: Addresss line 2 of the account owner

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Two character state abbreviation of the account owner

parameters.name: zip
parameters.description: Five digit integer zip code of the account owner

data.description: A JSON representation containing one organization and one member.
